Package org.thormor.vault

A library that provides convenient ways to manage a Thormor Vault.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CLinkedVault A linked vault represents a thormor vault which the library user can poll for updates, or post messages for the owner of the linked vault.
CVault A vault represents secured online storage; and you can fetch or add content to it.
CVault.DetachedMessage This class is used to return the content of decrypted detached messages.
 

Enum Summary
CVault.State  
 

Exception Summary
CVaultException This exception is thrown when an unexpected issue with a vault is discovered.
 

Package org.thormor.vault Description

A library that provides convenient ways to manage a Thormor Vault.

You must implement an IRemoteProvider which stores data online, as well as an ILocalProvider which stores data locally.

Once you have written these two classes, you can create a new CVault instance, and use the methods in it to create, fetch and post messages to a vault.

All the methods that potentially access the network run synchronously, and take an IProgressMonitor that may be used to monitor the progress of any network calls.

Please also refer to the Library Documentation for more information.
